creator: mhilpert@gmx.de
text:
When i record some samples under the "Recording Controller" and then rename 
this controller (e.g. "Enter Data") and add a new "Recording Controller", all 
trailing new recorded samples are appended under the "Recording Controller" AND 
the (renamed) "Enter Data" controller!

I thought it's easier to rename the recording controller (as stated in the 
manual) and add a new one, instead of adding a new controller and drag&drop 
each single sample from the Recording Controller to the new controller.

I guess, better option could be function for replacement of node.
You should be able to replace Recording Controller with other type of Controller.
creator: hovan@pobox.sk
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
This was fixed in CVS a few weeks ago. Only the 1st Recording Controller in the
tree is used. Plus you can actually choose to record into any other controller
in the tree.
